mapper.select: SELECT s.ClassId AS classid, r.RouteName AS routename, s.ClassName AS classname, s.StartingTimeOfShift AS startingtimeofshift, s.ClosingTimeOfShift AS closingtimeofshift, s.PatrolDuration AS patrolduration, s.PatrolIntervalLength AS patrolintervallength, s.ClassErrorRange AS classerrorrange FROM dbo.XG_Class s INNER JOIN dbo.XG_Route r ON r.RouteId = s.RouteID

update.foreach:
UPDATE dbo.XG_Class
classname = #{item.classname},
startingtimeofshift=#{item.startingtimeofshift},
closingtimeofshift=#{item.closingtimeofshift},
classerrorrange =#{item.classerrorrange},
patrolduration = #{item.patrolduration},
patrolintervallength=#{item.patrolintervallength}
where classid=#{item.classid}
